description: This file provides a JavaScript module for making HTTP requests to a backend API, including functions for GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, error normalization, and URL handling, with integration points for authentication via Supabase.

methods.name: joinUrl
methods.description: Safely joins the API base URL with a given path, avoiding duplicate slashes.

methods.name: readJsonSafely
methods.description: Attempts to parse a JSON string safely, returning null if parsing fails.

methods.name: normalizeError
methods.description: Converts server error responses into a standardized error object for UI handling.

methods.name: getAccessToken
methods.description: Placeholder function for retrieving the current access token; currently returns an empty string.

methods.name: handleUnauthorized
methods.description: No-op function for handling 401 Unauthorized responses; currently does nothing.

methods.name: requestJson
methods.description: Main helper function to perform JSON API requests with error handling and optional authentication.
